isSepaCountry.description: Is Valid Single Euro Payment Areas (SEPA) Country

width.description: Width of the image in pixel. Default = 500

height.description: Height of the image in pixel. Default = 500

devicePixelRatio.description: Device pixel ratio of the image. Default = 1.0

backgroundColor.description: Background color in RGB, HEX, HSL or color name. Default = 'transparent'

chart.description: Chart or table (JSON or CSV) that will be used to create the chart image.

type.description: Chart type of the generated image. Default = 'Bar'

width.description: Width of the image in pixel. Default = 500

height.description: Height of the image in pixel. Default = 500

devicePixelRatio.description: Device pixel ratio of the image. Default = 1.0

backgroundColor.description: Background color in RGB, HEX, HSL or color name. Default = 'transparent'

graph.description: Graph data in syntax of the Graph Description Language (DOT)

width.description: Width of the image in pixel. Default = 500

height.description: Height of the image in pixel. Default = 500

devicePixelRatio.description: Device pixel ratio of the image. Default = 1.0

backgroundColor.description: Background color in RGB, HEX, HSL or color name. Default = 'transparent'

data.description: Table data as JSON or CSV that will be used to create the chart image.

title.description: Title of the image appears above the table image

hasLines.description: Draw columns and rows with lines

codeFormat.description: Choose a code type. Default = 'QR CODE'

width.description: Width of the QR or barcode. Default = 200

height.description: Height of the QR or barcode. Default = 200

outFormat.description: Output format of QR or barcode image. Default = 'PNG'

image.description: Icon (picture or url) of an image embedded in the barcode. Default is empty

imageOpacity.description: Opacity (in %) of the embedded image. Default = 90

imageRatio.description: Ratio (in %) of the embedded image. Default = 20

color.description: Color that will be converted. e.g. rgb(120, 55, 66), hex 6400FF, red etc.

file.description: Image file (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, SVG) to be converted

outFormat.description: Output format in which the image is converted. Default = 'JPEG'

maxScanRows.x-ms-summary: Number of rows for field type detection
maxScanRows.description: Number of rows for automatic field type detection. Default = 20

skip.description: Skip a number of rows at beginning. Default = 0

skipLast.description: Stop at a specific row number. Default = convert all rows

delimiter.description: Separator (delimiter) of the fields. Default = 'Automatic detection of separator'

html.description: HTML content that will be used to create the PDF file

isLandscape.description: Is the PDF to be created in landscape format? Default = false

imageQuality.description: Maximum image quality (in pixel) for the included images. Default = 800

footerOption.description: Display options in the document footer. Nothing displayed by default

headerOption.description: Display options in the document header. Nothing displayed by default

paperFormat.description: Defines the paper format, e.g. A3, A5, Letter, etc. Default = 'A4'

marginTop.description: Defines the top margin (in pixel) of the PDF. Default = 20

marginBottom.description: Defines the bottom margin (in pixel) of the PDF. Default = 20

marginLeft.description: Defines the left margin (in pixel) of the PDF. Default = 10

marginRight.description: Defines the right margin (in pixel) of the PDF. Default = 20

pageRanges.description: Defines which page are to be printed, e.g. 1-3,5 etc. All pages by default

scale.description: Defines the scaling factor of the page content. Default = 1

html.description: HTML content that will be used to create the Word file

mainCsv.description: Main CSV which has to be supplemented with the data from the 'Second CSV'

mainCsvColumn.description: Join using the column name common to both tables

secondCsv.description: Second table contains the data to be joined

mainJson.description: Main JSON which has to be supplemented with the data from the 'Second JSON'

mainJsonProperty.description: Join using the property name common to both JSONs

secondJson.description: Second JSON contains the data to be joined

maxScanRows.x-ms-summary: Number of rows for field type detection
maxScanRows.description: Number of rows for automatic field type detection. Default = 20

skip.description: Skip a number of rows at beginning. Default = 0

skipLast.description: Stop at a specific row number. Default = convert all rows

delimiter.description: Separator (delimiter) of the fields. Default = 'Automatic detection of separator'

json.description: JSON object, list or array that will be sorted

image.description: Main image which is overlapped by the watermark image

watermarkImage.description: Watermark image which should overlap the main image

opacity.description: Opacity (in %) of the watermark image. Default = '25'

ratio.description: Ratio (in %) of the watermark image to the main image. Default = '25'

imagePositionHorizontal.description: Horizontal position of the watermark image. Default = 'center'

imagePositionVertical.description: Vertical position of the watermark image. Default = 'center'
